DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The purpose study test whether Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30 twice day Metformin improve glycemic control vs. daily Insulin Glargine Metformin subject Type 2 Diabetes inadequately control basal insulin plus oral anti-diabetic therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30 Versus Insulin Glargine Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
